thread.title: Guy promises to eat Jason Segel's photo every day, until Jason Segel returns the favor
thread.title_full: Guy promises to eat Jason Segel's photo every day, until Jason Segel returns the favor

author: Stan Schroeder
title: Guy promises to eat Jason Segel's photo every day, until Jason Segel returns the favor
text:
From the "wtf" to "why in the name of" departments, comes a fella who ate a printed photo of Jason Segel, and posted footage of the feat on YouTube.
Not only that, the somewhat appropriately named YouTube user Dog Shit promises to eat one picture of Jason Segel every day â€” until Jason Segel eats his picture.
Which picture should Jason Segel eat, you wonder? Perhaps this one ?
SEE ALSO: Jason Segel tugs infinite heartstrings in new David Foster Wallace film
There's very little in the way of explanation, besides a message saying "I will not stop" and the hashtag #eatmyfacesegel . The YouTube video is currently one of the most popular posts on Reddit, but the uploader offered no additional comments.
Note the use of the word "pictures". Not photos. Does that mean drawings are also fair game? Also, can the photo be printed on something actually edible?
Perhaps the top YouTube comment sums it up nicely. "My girlfriend is a doctor and she said to not do this anymore." Unfortunately, it's unlikely this will convince this guy to stop.
Jason Segel: It's your move.
BONUS: Take a mind trip into the POV of these film characters
